title: Notion Org Chart Generator
description: Generate an organization chart from the Employee directory in Notion.

queries.description: Token of the integration to the Notion database. Token can be found in https://www.notion.so/my-integrations

databaseId.title: Database ID
databaseId.description: Database ID can be found in the url of the Notion page.

relationName.title: Relation name
relationName.description: Name of the column in the Notion database with which relations in the orgchart will be made.

personName.title: Person name
personName.description: Name of the column in the Notion database with name of the people.

personDescription.title: Person description
personDescription.description: Name of the columns in the Notion database which will be added to the chart bellow the person name
